messages.content: I worked on my truck all weekend. Spent $215 on parts and a special tool. Still did not fix the miss in the engine.
What is the problem with the engine?

It has a miss. Sometimes when you are driving it sputters and jerks and barely has any power. Other times it drives just fine. I have replaced so many things on it and nothing makes a difference for very long.
Sorry to hear that. I hope you find what is the problem with the engine.

situation: I spent all weekend working on my truck to fix a miss in the engine. Despite spending over $200 in parts, it didn't do a thing to fix the miss.

evidence: What is the problem with the engine?
interactionPattern.rationale: The assistant asks a clarifying question, and the user provides an answer.

evidence: I worked on my truck all weekend.
powerDynamics.rationale: The user initiates the conversation and provides most of the information.

evidence: I hope you find what is the problem with the engine.
emotionalTone.rationale: The assistant expresses sympathy and encouragement.

evidence: What is the problem with the engine?
engagementStyle.rationale: The assistant responds to the user's statements without strong direction.

evidence: I have replaced so many things on it and nothing makes a difference for very long.
knowledgeExchange.rationale: The user shares their personal experience with the truck issue.

evidence: Still did not fix the miss in the engine.
I have replaced so many things on it.
conversationPurpose.rationale: The user is seeking help to resolve a mechanical issue.

evidence: USER: I worked on my truck all weekend.
ASSISTANT: What is the problem with the engine?
turnTaking.rationale: Both parties contribute to the conversation with similar lengths.

I have replaced so many things on it.
